original_text: Instead, I will give it to your cruel enemies to punish them. They said to you, “Lie down on the ground, so that we can walk over you.” You made your backs become like the ground. You became like a street for your enemies to walk on.’ Instead, I will give it to your cruel enemies to punish them. They said to you, “Lie down on the ground, so that we can walk over you.” You made your backs become like the ground. You became like a street for your enemies to walk on.’ Instead, I will give it to your cruel enemies to punish them. They said to you, “Lie down on the ground, so that we can walk over you.” You made your backs become like the ground. You became like a street for your enemies to walk on.’ Instead, I will give it to your cruel enemies
korean_text: 그 잔을 너를 괴롭게 하던 자들의 손에 두리라 그들은 일찍이 네게 이르기를 엎드리라 우리가 넘어가리라 하던 자들이라 너를 넘어가려는 그들에게 네가 네 허리를 땅과 같게, 길거리와 같게 하였느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Instead, I will give it to your cruel enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 나는 그것을 너의 잔인한 원수들에게 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: so that we can walk over you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리가 너를 걸어갈 수 있을 것이다.'

sentences.original_text: You made your backs become like the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 등이 땅과 같게 만들었다.

sentences.original_text: for your enemies to walk on.
